content.rendered:
Take control of your finances
Ranked Among Africa's Fastest Growing Companies
Investment One has been ranked among Africa's Fastest growing companies by Financial Times and Statista. This prestigious recognition reflects our dedication, hard work, and strategic approach, underscoring our commitment to excellence and the value we provide to clients and stakeholders. We are grateful for this acknowledgment and remain steadfast in delivering exceptional financial solutions.
Forward Thinking Investment Solution
Stay ahead of the curve by adopting forward thinking investment strategies that help you navigate market fluctuations, identify emerging trends, and seize opportunities before they become mainstream.
BESPOKE WEALTH MANAGEMENT
Elevate your financial journey with our bespoke wealth management services tailored exclusively to meet your unique goals and aspirations.
Africa Opportunities Credit Fund
With Investment One Global Advisors UK, a London based company regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority UK as an Investment Adviser, Africa Opportunities Credit Fund will serve as a vital link between investors and high-impact SMEs in Africa. The Fund is raising $100 million to bridge the SME funding gap in Africa.

What We do

Welcome to Investment One, Your Trusted Investment Partner.

At Investment One, we understand that every individual’s journey toward financial success is unique. That’s why we are committed to providing personalized investment solutions tailored to your specific needs and aspirations.

With a proven track record of excellence and a team of seasoned financial experts, we help you navigate the complex world of investments. Whether you are a seasoned investor seeking to expand your portfolio or someone taking their first step into the realm of finance, our comprehensive range of products and services are designed to empower you on your financial growth path.

OUR APP TODAY

Empowering you to manage your investments on the go with real-time market updates and intuitive portfolio tracking. Take the first step towards financial success and join our community of savvy investors today.

Our Achievements

2023: Investment One is listed as one of Africa's fastest growing companies by Financial Times

We are listed as one of Africa’s fastest-growing companies by the Financial Times & Statista. We provide our customers with forward-thinking investment solutions and experiences that are technology-driven and support them in achieving their investment and financial goals. Click to read more

Investment CEO of the year at the Banks and other Financial Institutions (BAFI) Awards in 2021

In 2021 also, The CEO of Investment One, Nicholas Nyamali was recognised by the Bank and other Financial Institutions (BAFI) as the Investment CEO of the year. This award came in at a time when the exemplary leadership of the pioneer founder Nicholas Nyamali led his team to winning a large part of the market share.

Financial Times Africa’s Fastest Growing Company

Yearly, Financial Times and Statista recognises and publishes a list of the 100 fastest growing companies in Africa. In 2023, The Investment One group got listed amongst Africa’s Fastest Growing Companies by Financial Times and Statista.

Most Innovative Financial Services by Derivatives in 2021

In 2021, the Investment One Group was recognised as the Most Innovative Financial Services Company in Nigeria. This award followed significant innovations pioneered by the group before other organisations in the investment industry. The Investment One Group introduced Easy Invest, a USSD code for investing easily via telephones as well as the Virtual Investment Simulator that helps people practice and become more familiar with the stock market for free.

Investment Banking

Investment One Capital Management is an affiliate of the Investment One Group, it provides specialised investment banking and financial advisory services to clients in the private and public sectors, its services include debt issuance/capital raising, financial advisory, portfolio management, real estate, and research.
